name: 暗黑破坏岛/Diablo_IslanD
description:
Introduction

This is an adventure-themed👣 survival RPG game, the island🌋 has many devils, but also contains infinite treasures💰, the goal of the game is to constantly improve themselves, explore more dangerous islands, challenge more powerful devils👹! If you can't find the throne of life and inject your "stone of life"🔮 in an hour, you can only face death🙈.As a task,killing others can get the stone of soul, it can resurrect you, avoid starting from scratch.（It took us more than 3 years🌓 to develop. We took many detours in the middle. The open shaping of game equipment and characters is the same as Diablo 2. ）

Equipment:

  • 👚Dozens of green suits, each of which has completely random attributes, which vary according to the number of suits matched.
  • 👖Hundreds of legendary equipments, each of which has completely random attributes. The corresponding legendary attributes of legendary equipments can be separated into spiritual stones, which can be injected into other equipments in the suit.
  • 💍A variety of accessories, which can be combined with a suit set to make it easier to match more suits.
  • ♋A variety of runes, runes can form a powerful rune language, and can also affect suits or legendary properties, make it further enhanced!
  • 🍀A variety of small amulets that can be added to the backpack.
  • 💎A variety of gems that can be inlaid into equipment to add attributes.
  • 👹All of the above equipment and other treasures can only be dropped randomly from the monster head. A stronger head falls better. The higher the value of your treasure hunt, the easier it is to drop more and better items.

Game features

  • ⛳This is a real adventure island survival game. Once you die, you will lose everything.
  • ⏳Life on the island lasts only one hour, within which the "throne of life" must be found and the stone of life injected into it.
  • 👹There are at least one Diablo devil head and the "throne of life" on each island. If you inject your "Stone of Life" into the "throne of life", you will have a longer life.
  • 🔮When the "Stone of Life" that protects you has grown up, you can harvest all kinds of resources and "Stone of Soul". When you die, you can use the "Stone of the Soul" to resurrect perfectly and continue your adventure.
  • 🔪Hundreds of destructive islands have many demons, and there are hidden monsters in the sea. They are in danger everywhere. It is not easy to defeat them. There are more and more people on the island, but the "throne of life" is limited, so it is inevitable to compete for the throne.
  • 🍍The game has the equipment system similar to Diablo 2, open character shaping.

story

In 1004, the Holy Spirit 🌋Continent was destroyed by many years of war, and the river of life was connected with the ocean 🌊again, flooding the Holy Spirit Continent. The Holy Spirit Continent gradually became an isolated island⛳. The island's resources have become very limited, and the demon group has occupied the island in association with the Hell's Dark Destroyer. The island's living resources are all enclosed in the "throne of life", and the "stone of life" 🔮which contains the strength of Warriors must grow and grow in the "throne of life", and the "throne of life" has become a contested place on the island. While the Holy Spirit warriors are struggling for resources and fighting with the devil, the purpose of the devil's head is to use it as bait 🍬to seize the "stone of soul" of the warriors. Many warriors lose themselves and kill each other in the struggle for the throne of life, which is just another trap of the devil group...

Occupation:

  • 👑 King of Beasts: steel-like will, with super martial arts and transformation ability.
  • 🔥Mage: Powerful Ice and Fire magic ability, regards magic as life.
  • ⚡ Raytheon: All kinds of control, and has healing magic, comprehensive strength.
  • 👽assassin: explosive, ghostly existence.
  • 🔫Sagittarius: Powerful and precise archery that can give a person a lethal blow at any time.

Skills:

  • 🌵Each profession has three skill trees and can choose to practice at will, but the total skill points are limited.
  • 🔥There are also some Authentic skills that can be practiced in all professions.

Stone of Life:

  • 🔮has all kinds of life stones. The extra survival time after injection is different, and the harvest time and benefits are also different.
  • 🚑The stone of life may be destroyed by others, and it can also gain runes and other benefits. We should pay attention to protecting our own stone of life.
  • 💖After the stone of life has grown up, there is a chance to harvest the stone of soul, which can make you perfectly revive when you die and continue to take risks. It is very precious.

Throne of Life:

  • 🌋On hundreds of destructive islands, each island has at least one throne of life, which can be injected with any stone of life.
  • 🚀can be quickly transported to the throne Island injected with its own stone of life.

Dark Devil:

  • 💰They are distributed on different islands, with varying strength, but each demon head carries a lot of treasure.
  • 💑Some powerful demons may not be able to challenge themselves, and it's better to call friends.

📝Finally, remember: once you hang up, you may lose everything, just like life. In fact, life is also a game🎮, but can not save it📥.
